snippet.title: Super Mario Galaxy 零 Zero + Galaxy Level Engine V3 [Released, V1.2]
snippet.description:
:-:-:-:-: DOWNLOAD :-:-:-:-:
SMG0 (GLE-V3 Template Hack): https://github.com/SuperHackio/GalaxyLevelEngine/releases/download/V3.0.0.0/SMG0v1-2_GLE-V3TemplateHack.7z

The powerful Galaxy Level Engine has now been updated to Version 3! And in order to show you what it can do, I'm releasing this template hack which showcases a majority of the new features, features from the previous versions, and some integration with external code via Syati.

Included in the download are:
- Super Mario Galaxy Zero (40 stars)
- Dolphin HD Texture pack (only contains textures for objects new to this hack)
- My SMG2 Classic Controller add-on (https://youtu.be/KNAMVv-4W4g)
- Written instructions

Galaxy Level Engine (Github):
https://github.com/SuperHackio/GalaxyLevelEngine

:-:-:-:-: DISCLAIMERS :-:-:-:-:
Q: Why call it a "template hack"?
A: Everyone can build their GLE-based hack on top of this or copy features/setups/files to their own hack. Unlike the first two template hacks, we tried to spice things up with some modified and some new levels. Of course this is not going to compete with actual hacks in terms of custom levels, but hopefully you will still enjoy it.

Q: Does this work on all regions?
A: As seen in the video at 1:00 this hack will work with every available region of Super Mario Galaxy 2, as long as its on a real Wii/Wii U or emulator. The American, European and Korean releases were tested on console, the Japanese and Taiwanese releases were tested on emulator. HOWEVER due to differences in HUD design, text may appear distorted on the Japanese and Taiwanese regions. We cannot include original files in my hack to counter this effect. Thus I suggest players from said regions to use an American ROM or set their system language to English if applicable.
